## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G27300](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G27300)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ANAC040, NTL8</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis NAC domain containing protein 40, NTM1-like 8
- **Description:**   NTM1-like 8;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2039600
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
